commnet: Great to Work with, Good job. Will definitely use again if necessary

abstrac: Timely cost-effective solutions to IT requirements
bio:
During 25 years as the principal IT "guru" and "go-to-guy" for an operations research (OR) consulting firm I have acquired unique and proven insights on the design, development and deployment of applications that are: useful (provide the user with a needed capability); useable (the capability is easy and convenient to use); and used (applications that are useful and useable will actually be used effectively). I have also acquired an extensive toolkit that is useful for fixing existing applications and, more importantly, rescuing development projects that have somehow gone awry.
My principal area of expertise is the design and development of databases including the user interfaces required to insure the application meets the "useful, useable, and used" criteria. I'm committed to making the most effective use of the tools available, regardless of how they are selected.
My normal rate is $27.  I'm generally available from 10am to 10pm EST,including weekends.  Goal 20-30 hours per week.

At Dancehall we are constantly seeking new ways to improve our work and expand ourskills with an emphasis on innovation and class. It is our belief that good design is essential in improving the quality of life of a society, whether or not it is consciously observed by the average person. As artists we must maintain a high level of dedication to our craft so that future generations will continue to learn from and be inspired by our work.  If you want sleek cutting edge designs at an affordable price, then choose Dancehall.  We will not let you down.
World class design at affordable prices.
Designs are paid in full at the completion of the design process.  Upon payment all source files will be deliverd to the cleint immediately.

description.title: Programming
description: My name's Phong. I have 7 years of experience in web development. My best skills are with PHP (CodeIgniter and Wordpress), MySQL, JavaScript (jQuery, Twitter Bootstrap, ReactJS). I'm also good at UI,

commnet: Extremely experience. I would definitely recommend him.
He is quick and very knowledgeable. I would recommend him to anyone.

bio:
My name's Phong. I have 7 years of experience in web development. My best skills are with PHP (CodeIgniter and Wordpress), MySQL, JavaScript (jQuery, Twitter Bootstrap, ReactJS). I'm also good at UI, UX design. It helps my work always look professional.

My first priority is quality. What I concern is not just about accomplishment, it's about building long-term partnerships with trust, satisfaction and assurance.

The work process is: 
1. We clarify the specs of the project.
2. You create a milestone of 50% payment.
3. I finish a half of the project and show it to you, you check it, if it has bugs, I'll fix them. When it's okay you release the first milestone.
4. You create the next milestone of 50%. When the project is finished, you release the last milestone, I send you the files. And we're done.

Happy working!
Prefer to communicate on Skype. My ID is phong.vu.hong
